name: Petition of RHODE ISLAND DEFENSE ATTORNEYS ASSOCIATION
name_abbreviation: In re Rhode Island Defense Attorneys Ass'n

parties: Petition of RHODE ISLAND DEFENSE ATTORNEYS ASSOCIATION.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition of the Rhode Island Defense Attorneys Association requesting promulgation of a rule authorizing open-panel prepaid legal service plans and prohibiting closed-panel plans, as prayed, is denied.
DORIS, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Aram K. Berberian, Cranston, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
Petition of RHODE ISLAND DEFENSE ATTORNEYS ASSOCIATION.
No. 79-330-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Jan. 10, 1980.
Aram K. Berberian, Cranston, for petitioner.
